  updateActiveButton2();

  // FÃ¼r Balkendiagramm: sortiere nach BestandsgrÃ¶ÃŸe (groÃŸ zu klein)
  let dataToUse = subjectData;
  let colorsToUse = colors;
  
  if (type === 'bar') {
    // Erstelle Index-Mapping fÃ¼r ursprÃ¼ngliche Reihenfolge

        } : {

            label: function(context) {
              const percentage = ((context.parsed / totalBooks) * 100).toFixed(1);
              const item = dataToUse[context.dataIndex];
              return `${item.signature} - ${item.name}: ${context.parsed.toLocaleString('de-DE')} (${percentage}%)`;
            }
          }
        }
      },
      scales: type === 'bar' ? {
        x: {
          title: {
            display: true,
            text: 'Signaturgruppe',
            font: { size: 12 }
          },
          ticks: {
            maxRotation: 45,
            minRotation: 45,
            font: { size: 8 },
            callback: function(value, index) {
              const item = dataToUse[index];

              }

        }
      } : {}

}
